activities: Acquire and process personal data concerning employees, interns applicants and independent contractors to determine, evaluate and implement employment-related actions and obligations; design, evaluate and administer compensation, benefits, option and other human resources programs; design, evaluate and implement education and training programs; monitor and evaluate conduct and performance of employees and independent contractors; manage company web tools, mailboxes, instant messaging and other company information systems; report statistics; for applicants, create a personal profile, validate identity and evaluate applicants; assure compliance with company policy; other uses to support business activities and processes
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
